about_the_game: E-Sports Hockey League is on a mission to create the ultimate online multiplayer hockey experience.  Get ready for fast-paced arcade hockey renewed with modern gaming tech. Team up with your friends and compete in online matches, tournaments, and leagues.  Customize your franchise and compete for promotion to the big show and win the big prize.  It Doesn't matter how, just win.  Create your own fantasy team and join a league with your friends or random players.  ESHL is a game for hockey players by hockey players.
